issue.title: [CF 1353] Shaman (Maelstrom Power)?
issue.body:
Unable to show the value of Maelstrom power that you have accumulated. Should be a way to show this power amount, similar to that of Combo points or holy power.


> Posted by CurseForge user occupiedstew | Imported from CurseForge issue #1353 | Raw

comments.body:
If you're using the Resource Display icon type, it definitely is there. If you're trying to do this with DogTag, use the [MP] tag since maelstrom is just your primary resource and is no different from any other primary resource.

Edited Jan 2, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
